summary: Completed comprehensive backend testing of Identity & Tenancy system. All 28 tests passed with 100% success rate. Authentication, organization management, RBAC, and audit logging all working perfectly.
passed_tests: User signup with email verification flow
Password reset flow with dev email verification
Member invitation system with role-based permissions
RBAC enforcement (VIEWER denied, ADMIN allowed for invites)
Audit log access with proper permissions
Dev email store functionality for all email types
